event-jar.description: Event Definitions for MGCP Resource Adaptor Type.

event-definition.description: An MGCP AuditConnection command, expressed as an event object, sent by a Call Agent to a Media Gateway to request the Gateway to send parameters of a connection. This command elicits an AuditConnectionResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP AuditConnection command.

An MGCP AuditEndpoint command, expressed as an event object, sent by a Call Agent to a Media Gateway to request the Gateway to send status information about one or more endpoints. This command elicits an AuditEndpointResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP AuditEndpoint command.

An MGCP CreateConnection command, expressed as an event object, sent by a Call Agent to a Media Gateway to request the Gateway to create a connection between two endpoints. This command elicits a CreateConnectionResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP CreateConnection command.

An MGCP DeleteConnection command. Sent by a Call Agent to request a Gateway to delete a connection, or multiple connections. Sent by a Gateway to a Call Agent to signify that a connection can no longer be sustained. This command elicits a DeleteConnectionResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP DeleteConnection command.

The MGCP EndpointConfiguration command, expressed as an event object, sent by a Call Agent to a Media Gateway to request configuration of an endpoint. This command elicits an EndpointConfigurationResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP EndpointConfiguration command, expressed as an event object.

An MGCP ModifyConnection command, expressed as an event object, sent by a Call Agent to a Media Gateway to request the Gateway to modify a connection between two endpoints. This command elicits a ModifyConnectionResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP ModifyConnection command.

An MGCP NotificationRequest command, expressed as an event object, sent by a Call Agent to a Media Gateway to request the Gateway to notify the Call Agent of specified events, to apply signals to designated endpoints, to handle "quarantined" events in specified ways, to detect events during a "quarantine" period, and to configure designated endpoints. This command elicits a NotificationRequestResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP NotificationRequest command.

An MGCP Notify command, expressed as an event object, sent by a Media Gateway to a Call Agent to notify the latter of events that have been detected by the Gateway. Elicits a NotifyResponse Event Object.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP Notify command.
An MGCP RestartInProgress command. Sent by a Gateway to signal that an endpoint, or a group of endpoints, are being taken through a restart. This command elicits a RestartInProgressResponse event.
The acknowledgment to an MGCP RestartInProgress command.
